name: Aladin and the Gun ( Action Shooter Prince to save Princess )
name_original: Aladin and the Gun ( Action Shooter Prince to save Princess )
description:
Alladin and the Gun is a new innovative concept into one of the oldest stories which is read for more than 1000 years.
Princess is In danger and the path is full of enemies but thanks to the flying magical MAT and his GUN.
Fight with various enemies and save the princess.
It is full of adventure and danger. It is absolutely amazing.


Fly as far as possible and shoot Enemies along the way to amass high scores and collect awards. Upload your best runs to the GameCenter leader board.
Collect Coins to unlock new Guns and Powers.

Features:

• Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth controls.

• Eye popping high definition 3D graphics

• Environments that change every few minutes you play.

• GameCenter leaderboards, achievements and challenges

• Easy but fun game mechanics.

• Hours of addictive gaming!

• Gorgeous HD graphics that really pop and unique music make Aladin a feast for your eyes and ears.
